Community health is safeguarded
To reach a sustainable future, every company must seek to anticipate and avoid concerns from the communities which could be affected by its presence and operational activities.

A company must be conscious of the impact its operations have on its physical surroundings and take active steps to avoid any possible disruption. A large part of this is ensuring that local communities have access to a concerns mechanism, which allows any issues to be raised and dealt with effectively.
